code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import io from'socket.io-client';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io(`http://${window.location.hostname}:5000`,{transports:['websocket'],cors:{origin:"*"}});const DesktopView=()=>{const[message,setMessage]=useState('');const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{socket.on('connect',()=>{console.log('Connected to server');});socket.on('receive_message',data=>{setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,data]);});return()=>{socket.off('connect');socket.off('receive_message');};},[]);const sendMessage=()=>{socket.emit('send_message',message);setMessage('');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Flask-SocketIO Desktop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Enter a message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"Send"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:msg},index))})]});};export default DesktopView;
